meta.name: Brilliant Minds
meta.description: Inspired by the extraordinary life and work of world-famous author and physician Oliver Sacks, Brilliant Minds follows a revolutionary, larger-than-life neurologist and his team of interns as they explore the last great frontier - the human mind - while grappling with their own relationships and mental health.

videos.title: Pilot
videos.overview: Dr. Oliver Wolf reluctantly accepts a job at Bronx General Hospital where he's forced to work with a team of interns as they treat a mother who can no longer recognize her kids.

videos.title: The Disembodied Woman
videos.overview: When a high school girls' basketball coach is faced with a debilitating illness, Dr. Wolf must help his patient reconnect with her body before it's too late. Ericka and Dana treat a frat boy who sees dragons.

videos.title: The Lost Biker
videos.overview: A member of a biker gang seeks out Dr. Wolf's help as he grapples with life-threatening memory loss. The interns are tasked to help a young girl struggling with mysterious seizures.

videos.title: The Blackout Bride
videos.overview: When a bloody bride stumbles into Bronx General, Wolf goes to extreme measures in a race against the clock to save her and her missing husband. Ericka and Jacob must find a reason for their John Doe patient not to get transferred out of their care.

videos.title: The Haunted Marine
videos.overview: Wolf must help a Marine grapple with mysterious symptoms before the birth of his child.

videos.title: The Girl Who Cried Pregnant
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf and the interns go back to high school to treat a group of pregnant teenagers.

videos.title: The Man from Grozny
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf and the team perform their most experimental treatment yet: a brain computer interface implantation in their John Doe patient's brain.

videos.title: The Lovesick Widow
videos.overview: When an elderly woman is brought in with signs of dementia, Dr. Wolf investigates whether she's suffering from a neurological disorder or having a late-in-life awakening. Dr. Pierce grapples with a chilling discovery about one of her patients.

videos.title: The Colorblind Painter
videos.overview: When an artist refuses to paint for his upcoming show, Dr. Wolf and his team must figure out why. Dr. Pierce goes into uncharted territory with a patient.

videos.title: The First Responder
videos.overview: An unexpected patient crashes into Bronx General with mysterious life-threatening symptoms.

videos.title: The Other Woman
videos.overview: Dr. Pierce treats a patient in crisis, presenting an ethical dilemma. Dr. Wolf and Dr. Nichols disagree on how to treat a patient.

videos.title: The Doctor Whose World Collapsed
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf and his team face their biggest challenge yet when an apartment building collapses in the Bronx.

videos.title: The Man Who Can't See Faces
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf meets a pastor dealing with mysterious visions. The interns grapple with the fallout from the building collapse.

videos.title: The Phantom Hook
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf helps an MMA fighter with mysterious symptoms; Dr. Pierce considers a career outside of Bronx General.

videos.title: The Contestant
videos.overview: A reality show contestant lands at the hospital with an unusual delusion; Dr. Pierce fights for her future at Bronx General.

videos.title: The Pusher
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf and his team treat a young patient accused of a serious crime.

videos.title: Lady Liberty
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf and Dr. Pierce are tasked with a house call to evaluate a woman under a conservatorship.

videos.title: Once Upon a Time in America
videos.overview: When two patients arrive in critical condition, Dr. Wolf and Dr. Nichols must do whatever it takes to keep them alive.

videos.title: The Doctor's Graveyard
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf is haunted by a ghost from his past; a patient arrives at Bronx General who appears to have risen from the dead.

videos.title: The One That Got Away
videos.overview: A blast from the past shakes up Dr. Wolf's world when he becomes his next patient.

videos.title: The Upside Down
videos.overview: On a flight gone wrong, one patient's life is quite literally turned upside down.

videos.title: The Fire Fighter
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf helps a fire fighter and his family navigate a life-changing diagnosis on Thanksgiving.

videos.title: The Resident
videos.overview: Dr. Wolf helps a ballerina recover after a mystery illness; the team tries to save Sam's life and get him on the transplant list; secrets are revealed at the hospital's annual holiday gala that change the course of the doctors' lives.
